mentions.candidate: Paul Sample is a local candidate who has served South Wiltshire all his life.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Votes in May local elections show Paul Sample is a STRONG 2nd and can beat the Tory.

images.caption: Paul Sample with a caption: 'Election Communication PAUL SAMPLE Liberal Democrat candidate for Salisbury ELECTION DAY - JUNE 8th Vote for a hardworking local MP'

leaflet.additionalNotes: He doesn't want to be a Minister - so Paul can speak out without fear of being sacked. Took more votes than any Liberal Candidate in history last time he stood in Salisbury.
